title: 1.10.2Eqipment 指令不起作用
author: 啊所谓
txt_content:
如题，
1.10.2中Equipment装备无法起作用，以下的代码请大佬们看看
    /summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {......... , Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:0S},{}],
                                                            DorpChance:[0.0f,0.0f,0.0f,0.8f,0.0f]}
CB直接跳过这一段，如果格式有问题，大佬给个模板，请再给个实例，谢谢。

replies.author: SPGoding
黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
1.10.2的格式是（以一身钻石套为例）：
ArmorItems:[{id:"diamond_boots",Count:1b},{id:"diamond_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"diamond_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"diamond_helmet",Count:1b}],HandItems:[{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1b},{id:"diamond_sword",Count:1b}]

replies.author: 啊所谓
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2018-8-5 20:56
/summon 实体 ~ ~ ~ {ArmorItems:[靴子,护腿,胸甲,头盔],HandItems:[主手,副手],ArmorDropChances:[靴子掉 ...
1.10.2 中Attributes标签还和以前一样吗？

replies.author: 啊所谓
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2018-8-5 20:56
/summon 实体 ~ ~ ~ {ArmorItems:[靴子,护腿,胸甲,头盔],HandItems:[主手,副手],ArmorDropChances:[靴子掉 ...
请教一下，500金粒......马上就是你的啦qwq

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
啊所谓 发表于 2018-8-7 01:49
1.10.2 中Attributes标签还和以前一样吗？
嗯，应该没什么改动
